Entry.JapaneseText: ランドグリーズの遺跡
ランドグリーズの遺跡
<voice:36000017>ふははは……最高の気分だ！ ヒューマの叫びが聞こえる！ ヒューマの苦しみが見える！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000017>Muhahaha! This is the best! Hearing the sounds of their screams! Witnessing their torment firsthand!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000018>気に食わんヒューマどもを 痛めつける事ほど 愉快な事はない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000018>There's no greater joy than inflicting violence on those repulsive Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000019>ああ、そうだ……もっと…… もっとやるんだ、トーマ…… ヒューマを殺せ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000019>Yes, that's right... More... Keep going, Tohma! Kill the Huma!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001a>……何を言っている…… やめろ……
<voice:300000be>だが今こそ、我らヒューマが この国の覇権を握る時だ！ いまわしきガジュマは 我々の前にひれ伏すがよい！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000BE>At long last, it is time for us Huma to gain supremacy over this nation! The inferior Gajuma shall grovel at our feet!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001b>愚かなヒューマめ！ 貴様らこそ、我らガジュマの 下僕となるべく生まれた存在だ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001B>Foolish Huma! It is you who were born to to serve us Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001c>上も下もない…… ヒューマとガジュマは同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>…… 等しい存在だ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001C>There are no servants or masters... We are all a part of <Yellow>Mankind<White>... We are of equal worth.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001d>何を言う？ ガジュマこそ優れた種。 上に立つべき存在ではないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001D>What are you talking about? Gajuma are the superior species! Does that not give us the right to lord over them?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001e>おまえもそうだろう。 ヒューマたちを従えて、 ぞろぞろ歩いているではないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001E>You feel the same way, don't you? Conquering the Huma will make them all fall in line.
<voice:3600001F>No, that's not how I feel at all!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000005>あんたが何をしているかには興味はない。 だが、そうしてヒューマと共にいる事は あんたのためにはなるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000005>I have no interest in what you are doing, but staying in the company of these Huma will bring you nothing but trouble.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000009>……道はふたつにひとつ。 我らのように他を寄せつけぬか、 主従の関係を作るか。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000009>...There can only be one outcome: either the races will have to segregate themselves as we do here, or one will come to lord over the other.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000020>ドバルの言うとおりだ…… ヒューマどもとの共存など、 しょせん不可能なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000020>Doval is right. Co-existing with Huma is nothing but a pipe dream!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000021>ヒューマを支配しろ…… それを拒むヒューマどもは殺せ…… ヒューマに生きる価値などない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000021>We must dominate the Huma... and slay those who refuse to submit! Their lives hold no value!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000022>それは違う…… 互いの違いを認め、理解し合えば、 共に歩む事ができるはずだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000022>You're wrong. If we work towards understanding each other and accepting our differences, then there's no reason we can't walk side by side!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000085>溝を埋める気などさらさらない。 ヒューマを根絶やしにしてしまえば、 溝などなくなるのだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000085>Well, we have no intention of closing any rifts. Once we eradicate these Huma, then there won't be any rifts to worry about!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000086>な、何が根絶やしだ！ それはこっちの台詞だ！ やれるもんなら、やってみろ！ 我らが同胞が黙っておらんぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000086>W-what do you mean "eradicate?!" That should be <Italics>our<NoItalics> line! If you think you you can kill us, go ahead and try! My brethren and I won't go down quietly!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000023>滅べ……滅べ、ヒューマども！ おまえたちが滅べば争いは無くなるのだ！ みんな滅んでしまえ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000023>Perish... Perish, you worthless Huma! When we're rid of you, then conflict will be no more! Perish, all of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000024>……恐ろしい事を…… 俺は……俺はこんな事…… 考えてはいない……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000024>How horrific... I... I would never think of... such a thing!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000025>ああ……なんて醜いの…… ガジュマの、ガジュマの身体が こんなに醜いなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000025>Ugh... How unsightly! There's nothing in this world more hideous than the body of a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000026>返して…… 私の本当の身体を返して……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000026>Give it back! Give me my actual body back!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000027>醜いのはヒューマのほうだ！ おまえには、醜いヒューマの 身体がお似合いだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000027>Huma are the unsightly ones! An ugly Huma body suits you better!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000028>……今すぐその身体を 陛下にお返ししろ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000028>Return that body to Her Majesty at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b0000af>ガジュマとヒューマの共存社会を 取り戻すためなら、 私はどんな手段も辞さない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B0000AF>If it brings about the return of a society where Huma and Gajuma will coexist once more, then there is no method too extreme.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002b>ガジュマとヒューマの共存など、 まやかしに過ぎん！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002B>Co-existence between Huma and Gajuma is nothing more than a fairytale!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002c>ヒューマと共に生きる事など できるものか……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002C>Do you really think that we could ever stand living alongside Huma?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002d>今まで、そうやって来た！ できるはずだ……！ できないはずがない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002D>But we were already doing just that! It's possible! There's no reason why we can't!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002e>その結果の、この争いなのだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002E>But doing that brought us into conflict, did it not?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002f>だが、誰も争いたくはないはずだ…… 思いが同じならば…… いつか、それはかなうはず……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002F>No one desires conflict... If everone agrees to that, then we won't have to fight.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000030>なんて……なんて美しいの…… これがヒューマの身体…… やっと手にいれたわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000030>What impeccable beauty... So this is the body of a Huma... It's finally mine!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000031>あなたはガジュマの誇りを捨て、 醜きヒューマに 成り下がってしまった……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000031>You've thrown away your pride as a Gajuma, and degraded yourself by taking on the foul appearance of a Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000032>誰もが迷いを抱え、生きている。 そうした迷いがあるからこそ、 人は成長できるのではないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000032>In this life, everyone will lose their wat at some point. If we didn't, then how would we ever grow as people?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000033>我々は迷える女王などいらない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000033>We have no need for a Queen who has lost her way.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000034>ガジュマの身体に 誇りを持てない者など、 もはや女王ではありえない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000034>One who has no pride in her Gajuma body is unfit to be Queen!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000035>陛下はまだお若い…… いつか……わかってくださる…… わかってくださるはずだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000035>Her Majesty is still young. Some day... She'll come to understand. She has to.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000036>いやっ!! ガジュマに触られたくないの!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000036>No! I don't want some Gajuma touching me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000037>わたしに……近寄らないで…… 来ないで……来ないでッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000037> Don't come near me... Stay away!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000038>ガジュマなんかに…… ガジュマなんかに 助けてもらいたくない……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000038>I don't need... I don't need help from the likes of Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000039>ああ、俺だっておまえのような ヒューマの小娘を助けるなど まっぴらだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000039>Right, and I'll be damned if I were to ever offer a hand to some Huma brat like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003b>内心、小娘の逆恨みに、 イライラしていたのだろう？ 死なないなら……殺してやれとな！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003B>Admit it. Didn't her misplaced hatred piss you off? If she wasn't going to drop dead, then you were going to do her in yourself!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003c>やめろ！ 何を言うんだ……！ やめろ……！
<voice:3600003d>……俺はヒューマが憎い…… 身勝手で傲慢なヒューマが憎い……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003D>I despise Huma... I despise their arrogance and selfishness!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003e>ヒューマは……ヒューマなど、 この手で滅ぼしてやる!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003E>I... I will eradicate them with my own two hands!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003f>脆弱なヒューマめ!! 消えろ！ 消えてしまえ!! うおおおおおおぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003F>You pathetic Huma! Die! Begone from this world! Uuuoooooh!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000040>俺の心の内側に……確かにある…… ヒューマへの憎しみや怒りが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000040>Deep within myself... I really do possess hatred and rage toward Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000041>そうだ、おまえの中には 激しい憎悪が渦巻いている。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000041>That's right, there is an intense hatred that is surging within you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000042>それなのに、なぜおまえは ヒューマへの攻撃をためらう!? なぜだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000042>And yet, why are you holding back your aggression towards the Huma?! Answer me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000043>……俺は……俺は…… ああああああぁぁぁぁッ……!!
<voice:36000045>おぬしの心は いつも揺らいでおる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000045>A storm rages deep within your heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000046>いっそ、ヒューマが憎いとする その心を受け入れたほうが 楽なのではないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000046>Would it not be easier to simply let yourself succumb to your hatred of Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000048>ならば、ワシの力など 必要あるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000048>Then you have no need for my power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000049>……誰でも、多かれ少なかれ、 他人に対して嫌悪や憎悪を 隠し持って生きています。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000049>...Everyone, to some degree, goes through life harboring feelings of hatred and disgust towards others.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600004a>しかし、我々には、 そんな負の感情を打ち消す 信頼や友情といった心の力が……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600004A>However, the heart has the power to foster trust and friendship, which can drown out those negative feelings...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600004c>私がここまで来られたのは、 種族を越えた<Cyan>「絆」<White>が あったからです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600004C>The reason I've been able to come this far is because I've been able to form <Cyan>bonds<White> that transcend race.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600004d>私は信じたい。 すべての人々に種族を越えた <Cyan>「絆」<White>がある事を。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600004D>I want to believe that everyone is capable of forging those same <Cyan>bonds<White>...
<voice:3600004E>...That everyone has a heart that can feel those <Cyan>Bonds<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600004f>それを悪意で歪める者があらば、 私はその悪を取り除きたい。 彼らと……仲間と共に。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600004F>And if there are those whose hearts have been warped by malice, then I wish to erase that evil from them. Together with those... who I call my friends!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000050>聖獣ランドグリーズ…… 私はあなたの力を求める。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000050>Sacred Beast Randgriz... I ask that you grant me your power!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000051>ほっほっほっほっ……完敗だ。 おぬしと仲間たちとの<Cyan>「絆」<White>、 しかと、受け止めたぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000051>Hohoho... I admit defeat. The <Cyan>bonds<White> that you and your comrades possess have utterly convinced me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000052>フォルスキューブを出すがよい。 ワシの力を与えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000052>Manifest your Force Cube, so that I may grant you my power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000054>やったネ!! これで、聖獣の力が 全部そろったヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000054>Yay, we did it! We've acquired the powers of all the Sacred Beasts!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000055>ゲオルギアスの思念を 浄化できるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000055>Now we can purge the world of Geyorkias's <Blue>Will<White>, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000057>その前に聞かせてくれ。 聖獣はなぜ、オレたちに 浄化の力を与えてくれたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000057>Wait, there's something I want to ask. Why have you entrusted us with the powers of purification?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000058>うむ…… もっともな疑問だな……
<voice:36000059>……かつて、ガジュマとヒューマは、 種族ごとに分かれて暮らし、 別々の道を歩んでいた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000059>Long ago, Gajuma and Huma lived apart from one another, and were forging their own paths.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005a>しかし、文明を急速に 発達させたヒューマは、 ガジュマを支配下に置こうと、 戦いを仕掛けた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005A>Eventually the Huma, who had a rapid rise to civilization, waged war in an attempt to subjugate the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005b>我らの王ゲオルギアスは、 ヒューマがこの世界自体を 揺るがす脅威になると考え、 ヒューマを滅ぼす事を決意した。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005B>Our King, Geyorkias, felt that Huma were a threat that would shake the world to its core and set out to eradicate them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005c>だが、ワシを含む 六聖獣は反対した。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005C>...The six Sacred Beasts, myself included, opposed him.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005d><Yellow>ヒト<White>同士の対立もまた、 自然の営みであり、そこに 我ら聖獣が介入すべきでないと……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005D>We believed that conflict between <Yellow>Humans<White> was a natural occurence, and that we should not meddle in their affairs.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005e>そして、聖獣王ゲオルギアスと 六つの聖獣は袂を分かち、 戦う事となってしまった。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の戦いも続いておった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005E>Thus, we six Sacred Beasts parted ways with our King and waged war against him, while the war of <Yellow>Mankind<White> continued on...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005f>長い長い戦いの末、 我らは聖獣王との戦いに勝利し、 ようやく事態は収まった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005F>After an arduous battle, we had finally gained victory over our King, and left those dark days behind.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000060>その戦いの影響で大地は疲弊し、 もはや、ヒューマにもガジュマを 支配する力は残っていなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000060>The war had severely ravaged the land, and neither Huma nor Gajuma had the strength left to vie for dominance.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000061>そして、今……思念が満ち、 ヒューマとガジュマが争い、 憎しみ合っておる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000061>Yet now... The <Blue>Will<White> has again taken hold, and Huma and Gajuma have once more descended into hatred and conflict

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000062>ヒューマを滅ぼそうという 王の考えが正しかったのではないか という意見も出始めておる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000062>We then began to wonder if perhaps King Geyorkias's plan to eradicate Huma had not been the correct course of action all along.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000063>あの時、ヒューマが滅びておれば、 このような争いが再び起こる事は なかったからのう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000063>Had the Huma been destroyed then, perhaps these conflicts would not have begun anew.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000064>おぬしらは力を求めた。 それは、ふたつの種族を 共存に導こうという希望の光。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000064>You sought our power, which is a ray of hope that can guide the two races to a path of coexistence.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000065>その希望が我らの力を得、 種族の共存を勝ち得たならば、 それでよし。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000065>All I can ask for is that that hope is capable of using our power to achieve peace between the races.
<voice:36000066>Should your efforts be in vain, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000067>ヒューマが滅んでも 仕方がない、という事か……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000067>...You'll have no choice but to eradicate the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000068>うむ……我らは、おぬしらに すべてを託す事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000068>Yes... We have entrusted everything to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000069>そして、おぬしらは 我ら聖獣の課した試練に 見事打ち勝ち、力を得た。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000069>For you have all successfully overcome the trials of the Sacred Beasts, thus earning our power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600006a>さあ、我が光のもとへ集まるがよい。 それぞれの力と思いを…… ひとつにするのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600006A>Now, come assemble within my light. Everyone's powers and thoughts... shall become one.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Eugene>は 奥義『迅雷天翔撃』が 習得可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><Eugene> can now learn the Fusion Force "Thunder Descent".

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000003>こんなところにいちゃあ、 確かめようもないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000003>We probably won't know for sure until we get out of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000006>まさか…… あの薬は効いてなかったのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000006>You're kidding me... The medicine we gave you didn't work?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000007>効き目はあったが…… 充分ではなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000007>No, it helped to some extent... But it wasn't enough.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000008>だが、おまえたちの気持ちが、 俺の心を鎮めてくれた……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000008>What truly soothed my heart were your feelings.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000009>ここまで…… ここまでずっと耐えてきたの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000009>You... You've had to endure that this whole time?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700000b>なんて人なの…… 驚きを通り越してあきれたわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700000B>...This guy... Just when you think he can't surprise you any more...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700000d>……もう大丈夫だ…… 心配かけたな……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700000D>I'm fine.... Sorry to have made you worry.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000010>まあまあ、<Mao>。 よかったじゃねえか。
<voice:37000011>うん、そうだよネ…… そうだよネ……
<voice:37000012>すべては、終わったようだ。 よく耐えたのう、<Eugene>よ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000012>It appears that it has all come to an end. You have held out well, <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000014>私たちが、直接この世界に 関わるのは、ここまでだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000014>From this point on, we shall no longer directly interfere with this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000015>もう会えないの？ 聖獣の力はどうなっちゃうの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000015>So we won't ever see you again? What will happen to all of your powers?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000016><Mao>…… 本来、聖獣は<Yellow>ヒト<White>の社会に 干渉すべきではないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000016><Mao>... The Sacred Beasts were never meant to meddle in the affairs of <Yelllow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000018>これ以上、<Yellow>ヒト<White>の世界に 関わるわけにはいきません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000018>No longer can we be involved in the world of <Yellow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000019>もう少しだけ、<Veigue>たちと 一緒に旅してみようかと 思っていたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000019>I would've loved to be able to travel with <Veigue> and his friends just a little longer...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700001b>はいはい、わかりました。 じゃあ、<Veigue>、みんな、 元気でね！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700001B>Yeah yeah, I know. Well, <Veigue> and pals, take care!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700001f>まずはここから出て、 世の中がどうなったのか 確かめてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700001F>First things first, let's get out of here and see what's happened to the outside world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000007>ワシは聖獣ランドグリーズ…… 「地」すなわち大地を司る者である。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000007>I am the Sacred Beast Randgriz... I govern earth, that is to say, the ground beneath your feet.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000009>正確に言うならば、 おぬしらの目の前におるのは、 ワシの精神体だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000009>Strictly speaking, what you see before you is not my true form, but rather an apparition.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000a>ワシの身体はとうの昔に滅び、 サニイタウンの土台となった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000A>My body was destroyed long ago, and became the foundation upon which Sunnytown was built.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000b>聖獣の身体が街の土台？ じゃあ、<Blue>幻の島<White>というのは、 あんた自身の事なのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000B>So this town was built on top of a Sacred Beast? Then the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White> was actually you?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000c>いかにも……ワシは散歩好きでな。 かつてはカレギアの海を 泳ぎまわったものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000C>Indeed, I love going for strolls. I would swim around the vast seas of Callegea.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000d>その際、時折、海面からのぞく ワシの背中を見て、 人々は島だと思ったようだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000D>When I still roamed about, those gazing upon the sea would see glimpses of my back protruding from the water's surface and mistake it for an island...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000e>ワシの説明はそのくらいにして、 本題に入るとしよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000E>But that is enough explaining from me. Let us move on to the matter at hand.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000f>すまぬが、<Eugene>とワシを 二人にさせてもらうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000F>Pardon me, but may I have a moment alone with <Eugene>?
<voice:36000010>You have finally made it this far, <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000011>力を欲する理由も、決意の強さも、 おぬしがここに至った事実をもって、 証明されたと言えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000011>One can say that standing here alone is testament to your motivations and strength of resolve.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000013>だが、おぬしら<Yellow>ヒト<White>は、 もろき生き物だ。 すぐに、たやすき方へと流される。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000013><Yellow>Humans<White>, however, are weak creatures; quick to succumb to their impulses.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000014>思念に取りつかれ、 ヒューマ憎しとなったおぬしなら わかるであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000014>You, whose heart was consumed by hatred for Huma after being exposed to the <Blue>Will<White>, should know that quite well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000015>そのような弱き<Yellow>ヒト<White>に、 ワシの力を与える事には 少なからず不安を覚える。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000015>I must admit that the thought of granting my power to a <Yellow>Human<White> with such a weakness fills me with unease.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000016>ゆえに、今後もおぬしが その強き心を持ち続ける事が できるかどうか、 ワシに見せてもらいたい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000016>Therefore, I ask you that you show me whether or not you are able to maintain that strength of heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
